name: Toy Marketplace
description: An API that facilitates buying and selling of various toys and collectibles, connecting buyers and sellers in an online marketplace.

name: Chef Recipe Hunter
description: An API that provides access to a wide range of chef recipes for various cuisines and dishes.

name: Summer Sports Camp
description: An API that provides information about summer sports camps for children and teenagers, including schedules, locations, and activities.

name: Classy Semolina
description: An API that offers sophisticated recipes and cooking techniques using semolina as the main ingredient.
